resps: Engineered an end-to-end camera flow using getUserMedia with a custom consent overlay, user guidance, and snapshot capture; implemented client-side JPEG compression with resilient error/fallback handling.

Delivered an analysis UI with tabs (Race/Age/Gender); normalized heterogeneous API schemas (0–1, 0–100, arrays), ranked outputs, and rendered percentages; added routing and localStorage to persist state.
Deployed to Vercel and introduced lightweight CI via GitHub Actions; optimized responsiveness and perceived performance.
Reduced average upload payload from multi-MB images to sub-1 MB via client-side compression, improving reliability on mobile networks.
Built a responsive React landing with reusable components and lightweight animations; shipped with Vite/React on Vercel.
Applied basic SEO and accessibility (a11y) checks; collaborated via Git/GitHub with PR reviews.
Supported secure access requests and customer verification within compliance requirements.
Maintained onboarding documentation and accurate tracking logs; partnered with internal technical teams to resolve requests quickly.
